Quincy.Roxbury Memorial High School:
Roxbury Memorial High School is a defunct secondary school for grades 9 through 12. Originally founded as Roxbury High School, the school was situated at 26 Townsend Street, Roxbury, Boston, United States from 1926 until its closure in 1960.


== History ==
Roxbury High School (for boys) was established in 1852, in what was then the City of Roxbury, Massachusetts on Kenilworth Street.
